name: Hand Knit lace panel child's hat
description:
This hat is knit in a extremely soft and machine washable yarn (50% Nylon 50% Acrylic)  and features a crochet flower in contrasting colors that makes it a perfect fit for your little princess.

It's fully customizable and can be hand knit in a variety of sizes (0-3 months up to 6 years old) and colors. 

All hats will be knit to order. Please allow up to 7 days to receive your hat.

name: Blue/grey Earflap hat
description:
Unisex earflap hat.

This hat is knit with wool silk blend yarn for softness and warmth. 50% wool 50% silk.

Hand wash in cold water and dry flat.
